channel.title: MVP Needs help! OMG! [VB6]
channel.description:
Lol hey peeps
okay i will try to explain this the best i can oO
In a nutshell im trying to make a serial code type thing
heres wut im trying to do
User A opens program User A is asked to enter a 15 digit serial code (not sure how many though) User A inputs code program looks on www.website.com/serials.txt Now wut i want the program to do is look for all numbers in the text and if it cant find the # User A enterered then they may not use the program
basicly grabbing numbers from a website?
Thanks.

@mvp566 wrote:

okay and? i just need an code id people hack it who cares i want something kinda simple…

just to keep the newbies out…

If a = a then

item.title: MVP Needs help! OMG! [VB6]
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

[quote=“Daed, post:2, topic:152147”]To put that text file into vb6 put a new inet control on and then wherever you want it you could say
textbox1.text = Inet1.openurl(“http://www.website.com/serials.txt”)

Sorry im rusty at vb as i quit it ages ago[/quote]

I think that just opens the url? doesent look for the numbers and stuff?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2007, 06:05:48 PM[/size][hr][quote=“nade, post:3, topic:152147”]Which will result in:

[code]
UNICODE “http://www.website.com/serials.txt”

PUSH ECX ;push arg2
PUSH EDX ;push arg1

CALL DWORD PTR DS:[MSVBVM60.StrCmp]

JNZ project.00000x ; <----- NOP this for crack

UNICODE “Auth Accepted”

00000x : “AUTH DENIED”
[/code][/quote]

Care to explain how it works?

Read full topic

item.title: MVP Needs help! OMG! [VB6]
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Which will result in:

UNICODE "http://www.website.com/serials.txt"

PUSH ECX ;push arg2
PUSH EDX ;push arg1

CALL DWORD PTR DS:[MSVBVM60.StrCmp]

JNZ project.00000x ; <----- NOP this for crack :(

UNICODE "Auth Accepted"

00000x : "AUTH DENIED"

Read full topic

To put that text file into vb6 put a new inet control on and then wherever you want it you could say

Sorry im rusty at vb as i quit it ages ago
